attributes.action: Enforce By-elections in constituencies where the MP defects to a different party
attributes.additional_details: Romford,Newark,Fareham & Waterlooville and any other constituencies that have their MP change party should have to hold By-elections. MPs are voted in largely on their alignment with a party's view not just the individual.
attributes.background: Discuss in parliament enforcing by-elections in constituencies where the MPs defect to another party.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

By-elections to be called automatically when MPs defect to another party
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737660
